channel.title: Use case examples :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Use cases Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: Real-world scenarios or case studies showing how the product can be used effectively. Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Docs on use case scenarios Use cases Use case flows Use cases were consistently the most sought after docs

item.title: SSO app use cases
item.description: SSO app use cases Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Saas Builder Changes to be made: Need to include a SSO + Universal Logout use case Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ (Why Build an SSO integration with Okta?) https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ (Use case examples) Why is this here?: Oktane 2024: Need additional research on which specific use cases customers are looking for.

item.title: Lifecycle management app use cases
item.description: Lifecycle management use cases Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Saas Builder Links to original docs: The use case examples from: Overview of lifecycle management in the OIN: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-lifecycle-mgmt-overview/ Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.

item.title: Service app use cases
item.description: Service app use cases Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Changes to be made: This is a new doc for new use cases, but you might be able to borrow some of the suggested existing doc for an introduction. Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-api-service-overview/ (Intro, integration benefits) Page type: Concept
